I like this film becuase it is one of the most crazed films I have seen with Sonny Chiba in it. Come on a fat chick on aphrodisiacs!! crazed henchmen with hilarious powers!!
 Some weird looking bum!! Man life couldnt be any better. But the ending is why I gave it four stars - it made no sense and it gave me no closure.
 The film is still good though, if your not a very serious person about these types of films.
